channel.title: Need to know how to make staves go straight up and down
channel.description: My server is currently using "fr33sc4p3 pkz" source, and in it, there is an iban staff code (1409), and i spawned it, and when you wield it, it goes straight up and down, like a walking stick sort've. I need a tut to make all staves go like that. So can somebody please post one here, and where to insert it?

item.title: Need to know how to make staves go straight up and down
item.dc:creator: @h4xx0rz h4xx0rz
item.description:
@h4xx0rz wrote:

My server is currently using “fr33sc4p3 pkz” source, and in it, there is an iban staff code (1409), and i spawned it, and when you wield it, it goes straight up and down, like a walking stick sort’ve. I need a tut to make all staves go like that. So can somebody please post one here, and where to insert it?
